page.title: 02Landscape of Twyning Green
page.content: {Twyning village green}is one of the most important pieces of Twyning's history. Not only is it old, but most activities in Twyning centre on the {green.}There have never been any buildings on the{green,}but it has changed through the years. It is now slightly smaller due to the roads being widened. It used to have a brook down the middle, surrounded by willow trees. There used to be a pond at the bottom of it. The{green}is owned by all the pasture holders in Twyning. The plane tree on the{green}has one of the largest circumferences around the trunk in the world. The tree is about two hundred and fifty years old; that gives you a good idea as to the age of the{green.}The plane tree is the only remaining tree out of an avenue of trees.
